body: I was just looking through the infractions pages and noticed Yoav is no longer staff. Is this just temporary, or is it permanent? I won't ask the reasons for demotion in case he doesn't want it to be public, but it would be nice to know. :c
body_tagged: I was just looking through the infractions pages and noticed Yoav is no longer staff. Is this just temporary, or is it permanent? I won't ask the reasons for demotion in case he doesn't want it to be public, but it would be nice to know. :c
title: Yoav not staff?

replies.body: It's only temporary. It's only for a short while.
replies.body_tagged: It's only temporary. It's only for a short while.

replies.body: Oh, ok that's good :D. Sorry if this was common knowledge already.
replies.body_tagged: Oh, ok that's good :D. Sorry if this was common knowledge already.

replies.body: Its not common knowledge. I made a mistake, and I have to pay my dues...

replies.body: But you don't have any recent infractions..........do you have to many infractions or is it something else?

It's most likely personal and I'm going to guess he'd rather not discuss it.
